  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:AA314_3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>AA314_3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Voice-leading analysis of music 3: the background</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stimme-führende Analyse von Musik 3: der 
Hintergrund</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">analyse Voix-principale de la musique 3 : le
fond</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">análise Voz-conduzindo da música 3: o 
fundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">analisi Voce-conducente di musica 3: i 
precedenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωνή-οδηγώντας ανάλυση της μουσικής 3: το 
υπόβαθρο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">análisis Voz-que conduce de la música 3: 
el fondo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">The music of Mozart has been used to examine the foreground and middleground of harmony in units AA314_1 and AA314_2. Now you will use Beethoven's Eighth Symphony to consider the largest-scale stage of voice-leading analysis.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Arts and History</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Beethoven</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">music</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">voice-leading_analysis</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Musik von Mozart ist verwendet worden, um den
Vordergrund und das middleground der Harmonie in den Maßeinheiten 
AA314_1 und AA314_2 zu überprüfen. Jetzt verwenden Sie 
Beethovens achter Symphonie, um zu betrachten groß-einstufen Stadium 
der Stimme-führenden Analyse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La musique de Mozart a été employée pour 
examiner le premier plan et le middleground de l'harmonie dans les 
unités AA314_1 et AA314_2. Maintenant vous emploierez le 
symphonie de Beethoven huitième pour considérer grand-mesurez 
l'étape de l'analyse voix-principale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A música de Mozart foi usada examinar o primeiro 
plano e o middleground da harmonia nas unidades AA314_1 e AA314_2. 
Agora você usará o symphony de Beethoven oitavo considerar 
grande-escala o estágio da análise voz-conduzindo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La musica di Mozart è stata usata per esaminare 
la priorità alta ed il middleground di armonia nelle unità AA314_1 
ed AA314_2. Ora userete lo symphony del Beethoven ottavo per 
considerare gran-regolate la fase di analisi voce-conducente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μουσική Μότσαρτ έχει χρησιμοποιηθεί για να εξετάσει
το πρώτο πλάνο και middleground της αρμονίας στις μονάδες 
AA314_1 και AA314_2. Τώρα θα χρησιμοποιήσετε την όγδοη 
συμφωνία Beethoven για να εξετάσετε το στάδιο μεγάλος-κλίμακας
της φωνή-οδηγώντας ανάλυσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La música de Mozart se ha utilizado para examinar
el primero plano y el middleground de la armonía en las unidades 
AA314_1 y AA314_2. Ahora usted utilizará la sinfonía de 
Beethoven octavo para considerar grande-escala la etapa del análisis 
voz-que conduce.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste und Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beethoven</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
